issue.description: FJ434338.2, GeneID: 100134444 (KCNJ18) has only low quality alignment to the GRCh37 reference assembly, suggesting the reference may lack true representation of this gene.
issue.resolution_text: GL383561.1 was released as a FIX_PATCH in GRCh37-Patch Release 2, providing sequence which extended into a reference assembly gap. This FIX_PATCH provides representation for this gene, FJ434338.2, Gene ID: 100134444 (KCNJ18), at 99.3% Identity.

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113936 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.17 unlocalized scaffold NT_113936 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC139367.2).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.description: Chromosome 17 sequence does not extend into p telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: AC240565.4 has been sequenced and extends from the GRCh37 telomere gap flanking component AC108004.3. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-2283

issue.description: Chromosome 17 sequence does not extend into centromeric repeat on one side of the centromere.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: 1 base deletion in AC068669 affecting variant of RAPGEFL1
issue.description: Deletion of a G in AC068669 affects coding region of a splice variant of the RAPGEFL1 gene. All transcripts disagree with genome.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459699.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for Gene ID: 51195 (RAPGEFL1) in GRCh38.

issue.status_text: A clone that extends slightly into this gap has been sequenced, but part of the RefSeq remains unrepresented. Further efforts to close this gap will continue to be tracked in HG-2285.
issue.description: NM_182705.2 extends into assembly gap of AC141424.3 and AC015853.8
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_001204477.1 (CDRT4) aligns to the reference with a non-consensus splice site, suggesting a 3nt deletion from the reference component AC005517.7
issue.resolution_text: This ticket refers to the same issue reported in linked ticket HG-1132, describing an additional RefSeq in disagreement with the Reference. Further investigation of this discrepancy will be tracked in HG-1132.

issue.description: NM_001204478.1 (FAM18B2-CDRT4) aligns to the reference with a non-consensus splice site, suggesting a 3nt deletion from the reference component AC005517.7
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573687.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update a 3bp deletion to the more common insertion allele and improve representation for GeneID: 100533496 (FAM18B2-CDRT4) for GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a type 2 gap between AC217768.1 and AC139677.4 in alt locus NT_167251.1
issue.resolution_text: AC244161.3 and AC244163.4 extend into this gap for GRCh38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-2287.

issue.description: There is a gap between AC217775.1 and AC019319.9 in alt locus NT_167251.1.
issue.resolution_text: RP11-84A7, accessioned AC243906.3, has been sequenced and spans this gap.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC214012.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383563.1 created to capture sequence from AC214012.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: Scaffold GL383563.1 was created to capture sequence from AC214012.3 not represented in reference chromosome. The update to GL383563.2 corrected 3 single nucleotide errors. The update to GL383563.3 extended the scaffold by adding 4 additional components that also contained sequence not present on the reference chromosome. These sequences are described in HG-1760, HG-1766, HG-1768 and HG-1769.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC207056.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383564.1 created to capture sequence from AC207056.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383564.1 created to capture sequence from AC207056.3 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC216282.3 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383566.1 created to capture sequence from AC216282.3 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion between AC087575.11 and AC090894.10
issue.resolution_text: GRCh37 component AC090894.10 (NC_000017.10: 21,898,773-21,992,358) has been replaced with AC206746.4, AC209154.2, and AC132825.8, to correct a path problem caused by a collapsed repeat. The GRCh38 path (NC_000017.11:22,372,166-22,549,994) contains a ~27kb insertion relative to the GRCh37 component. This pathway's validity will be further investigated in linked ticket HG-2312.

issue.description: possible missed join between AC060780.18 and AC109326.11
issue.resolution_text: The gap between AC060780.18 and AC109326.11 has been removed.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible base error
issue.description: Possible base error in GRCh37 at 17:44144993-44144993
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495991.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference within component CR936218.6 to update this base to the more common allele for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Indel in coding region of DCAF7
issue.description: An insertion of a G in the reference genome in the coding region of gene DCAF7 is not supported by any transcripts.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket reports the same discrepancy with the reference as HG-343. All work on this issue will be recorded in that ticket.

issue.summary: Tandem repeat length difference in start of coding region of FADS6
issue.description: Genomic sequence has shorter tandem repeat (2 copies) than matching transcripts (3 copies), leading to loss of one copy of peptide sequence MEPTEP from the N-terminus of theFADS6 protein.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC087651.19 will be used through its overlap with AC068874.21 to improve representation for Gene ID: 283985 (FADS6) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between AC144838.3 and AC233273.2. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-744.
issue.resolution_text: AC233702.5, AC193085.1, and AC243725.1 extend into this gap for GRCh38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-2284.

issue.status_text: The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap for GRCh38: AEKP01172923.1, AEKP01172922.1, AUXG01000165.1, ABBA01019643.1, AEKP01193505.1.
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between components AC232305.2 and AC174470.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-749.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC003070.2 - AC015855.13 region of Chr. 17. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 path has been added as an ALT_LOCI which provides a single haplotype pathway for this variant region.

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC091271.8 - AC025048.8 region of Chr. 17. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Incorrect switch point between AC003070.2 and AC217778.1 in GL000258.1/NT_167251.1
issue.description: Incorrect switch point in GL000258.1/NT_167251.1 between the reference anchor and the first haplotype-specific clone result in the anchor sequence being used over the correct haplotype sequence in the alt loci.
issue.resolution_text: Switch point curated so that the haplotype-specific sequence is represented in the alt loci over the reference anchor.

issue.summary: AC213194.1 is a Phase 2 Clone in the Reference
issue.description: Sequence from phase 2 clone AC213194.1 should be replaced with finished sequence.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_012418.2 indicates a deletion in AC139149.6, possible substitution of AC139149.6 with AC137896.5
issue.resolution_text: AC137896.5 has been added to the TPF following AC139149.6 and represents the missing portion of NM_012418.2

issue.description: Possible sequence variation within sequence for KRTAP9-9 (Gene ID: 81870) found on component AC006070.1?
issue.resolution_text: AC209539.6 (ABC9-43961700F1) has been submitted as alternate_loci to represent a second variant for the representation of KRTAP9-9 (Gene ID: 81870) found on reference component AC006070.1.

issue.description: There is a type 2 gap between AC217768.1 and AC139677.4 in alt locus NT_167251.1 originally described in HG-1146. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.
issue.resolution_text: There is a type 2 gap between AC217768.1 and AC139677.4 in alt locus NT_167251.1 originally described in HG-1146. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence

issue.description: Exon5 of NM_000442.3 (PECAM1) is missing from the alignment of the reference, suggesting missing sequence in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: AC234063.4 has been sequenced and has replaced AC138744.4 in the TPF. AC234063.4 contains exon 5 of NM_000442.3 (PECAM1).

issue.description: Possible assembly error or missing sequence affecting TTC25 (GeneID:83538)
issue.resolution_text: This patch corrects a deletion found in GRCh37 chromosome NC_000017.10, in component AC091172.11, affecting TTC25 (GeneID:83538).

issue.description: NM_004703.4 indicates a possible 25-nt tandem duplication in AC015727.7 that is not supported by 50+ mRNAs/ESTs
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of NC_000017.10 component AC004148.1, which is adjacent to AC015727.7, will be used to correct this discrepancy. AC004148.1 agrees with NM_004703.4 GeneID: 9135 (RABEP1) and represents the major allele for this 25nt indel.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_032595.2 (PPP1R9B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495721.1 and WGS contig ABBA01041227.1 have been added to the Chr. 17 Reference, patching component AC002401.1 to update three bases to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 84687 (PPP1R9B) in GRCh38.

issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC226497.2 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.resolution_text: AC131056.5 has been added as an ALT_LOCI to ensure representation for genes which were noted to be dropped from GRCh37B.

issue.description: Possible variation in sequence represented by AC006070.1 involving KRTAP4-1 (Gene ID: 85285)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Base update request with deleterious effect on SEBOX
issue.description: GRCh37 base update requested for GRCh38 (rs1387886) may introduce a frameshift in SEBOX.
issue.resolution_text: Human SEBOX is likely a pseudogene, and the base update at rs1387886 was made using minicontig KF573650.1 for GRCh38.

issue.summary: AC003958.3: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC003958.3 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: This clone name has been corrected.

issue.summary: AC004231.2: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC004231.2 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: This clone name has been corrected.

issue.summary: AC005939.1: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC005939.1 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: The local clone name for AC005939.1 has been edited to RP11-467K17 in both Chr. 17 and in Chr. 17 alt_ref_loci_1.

issue.summary: AC015849.5: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC015849.5 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: This clone name has been corrected.

issue.status_text: Switchpoints for this pair of components are being investigated: AC113189 and AEKP01075050.
issue.description: NC_000017.11 contains a 'ca' (nt 7513777-7513778) that is not found in NM_000937.4, causing a frameshift.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: This base is supported by the sequence from the three overlapping clones and by CHM1 Illumina whole genome data.
issue.description: AC233698.3 contains an putative extra "C" relative to NM_032258.4, which shifts the reading frame of this TBC1* family member gene, resulting in a truncated C-terminus.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC024918.5
issue.description: Analysis of GU268768.1, GU268089.1, GU268215.1, and GU266889.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 17, suggest there may be ~7,523 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC024918.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113939 (component:AC145081.1) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC145081.1 (RP13-1020E19) has been found to be redundant and is not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC003695.1
issue.status_text: This discrepancy looks like variation and will be considered for ALT representation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268348.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 17, suggest there may be ~2,574 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC003695.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC127496.5
issue.status_text: This discrepancy looks like variation and will be considered for ALT representation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268473.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 17, suggest there may be ~1,633 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC127496.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL353997.3
issue.status_text: This discrepancy looks like variation and will be considered for ALT representation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268744.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 17, suggest there may be ~9,696 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL353997.3. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113944 (component: AC145207.1) has an alignment to sequence present on reference chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC145207 RP11-498C9 has been place in the TPF and updated in build37. The New TPF is: AC145208 AC232305 GAP AC174470 AC145207 AC137723

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113931(component:AC037482.14) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC037482.14 (RP11-619M15) has been found to be redundant.

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.status_text: We are searching for more information on a potential gap spanner that would replace this sequence before we attempt to patch this ambiguous base.
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (R) in NC_000017.11: 489374 in component AEKP01197830.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: The component flanking the p telomere, AC240565.4, does not reach telomeric repeat. This ticket tracks the continued effort to extend into the telomere reported in HG-1049.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between AC243725.1 (ABC13-47656900H15) and AC233273.2 (ABC14-50118000O16). The following WGS contigs have been placed to represent some of the sequence in this gap: ABBA01035622.1, ABBA01035623.1, ABBA01035624.1, ABBA01035625.1, ABBA01035626.1, ABBA01035627.1, ABBA01006766.1, ABBA01006765.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-744 and HG-1319.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between AC233274.2 (ABC8-41097800F4) and AC015853.8 (RP5-1029F21). The following WGS contigs have been added to this gap: AEKP01197830.1, AEKP01197829.1. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-743.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a type-2 gap between components AC244161.3 (ABC14-139C6) and AC244163.4 (ABC14-139C7). This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in HG-1146.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113931(component: AC037482.14) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17

issue.description: A three clone pathway (AC206746.4, AC209154.2, and AC132825.8) introduced for GRCh38 (NC_000017.11:22,372,166-22,549,994) to fix a collapsed repeat reported in HG-12 should be investigated to determine whether it is a valid allele or whether it still contains a deletion/collapse error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113931(component: AC037482.14) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113931(component: AC037482.14) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC037482.14 (RP11-619M15) has been found to be redundant.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113932 (component: AC087365.3) has an alignment to sequence found on reference chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC087365.3 is composed of BAC clone RP11-570A16, which was re-sequenced and submitted as AC024051.5 and added to the GRCh38 Chr. 17 Reference in order to represent the missing gene GeneID:6066 RNU2-1 (NR_002716.2) reported in HG-800.

issue.description: Possible sequence variation within sequence for KRTAP9-9 (Gene ID: 81870) found on component AC006070.1?
issue.resolution_text: AC213246.1 (ABC8-5705249N4) has been submitted as an alternate_loci to represent a variant for the representation of KRTAP9-9 (Gene ID: 81870) found on reference component AC006070.1.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113939 (component:AC145081.1) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC145081.1 (RP13-1020E19) has been found to be redundant.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113931(component:AC037482.14) has an alignment to sequence present on ref. chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC037482.14 (RP11-619M15) has been found to be redundant.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_015077.2 (SARM1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontigs KF495704.1 and KF454896.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update several bases to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 23098 (SARM1) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Possible missing sequence from AC110285.14 affecting BAHCC1 (GeneID: 57597)
issue.resolution_text: AC213194.1 has been used to patch the deletion in component AC110285.14.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_080704.3 (TRPV1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product has been submitted to Genbank; Product is Accession number FJ695206

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_007148.3 (RNF112) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AC004448 has been updated to AC004448.4 and no longer has an indel with NM_007148.3

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003954.2 (MAP3K14) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459698.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 9020 (MAP3K14) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004860.2 (FXR2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product has been submitted to Genbank; Product is Accession number FJ695203.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_005828.3 (DCAF7) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence of AC046185.14, which better represents GeneID: 10238 (DCAF7) encoded by RefSeq NM_005828.3, will be used through the overlap with AC113554.9.

issue.description: ARL17/LRRC37A duplication on chr 17
issue.resolution_text: We have re-tiled through this region with a single haplotype pathway of RPCI-11 clones, and we believe that this duplication is real and not a product of a false join between redundant clones.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_016429.2 (COPZ2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AEKP01094114.1 has been added to the Chr. 17 Reference to patch component AC004477.2, updating three bases to the more common allele and improving representation for GeneID: 51226 (COPZ2) in GRCh38.

issue.description: AC010761.10 contains a 1-nt deletion compared to NM_018182.2
issue.resolution_text: PCR product has been submitted to Genbank; Product is Accession number FJ695200

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_024302.3 (MMP28) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Switch points have been adjusted to use the sequence of AC015849.5, which contains the correct base, through the portion of the AC006237-AC015849 alignment containing this transcript discrepancy.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_133373.3 (PLCD3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459697.1 has been added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 113026 (PLCD3) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001105520.1(LOC388327) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573667.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 388327 (LOC388327) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001010855.2 (PIK3R6) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573668.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 146850 (PIK3R6) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_003585.2 (DOC2B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: AC240565.4 has been sequenced and submitted. This clone extends toward the telomere and provides representation for the end of RefSeq gene NM_003585.2 (DOC2B).

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_152914.2 (MGC33894) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mincontig KF459695.1 and PCR product FJ695210.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to correct these two bases and improve representation for GeneID: 256302 (MGC33894) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_173568.3 (CCDC144B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495728.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this base to improve representation for GeneID: 284047 (CCDC144B) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: Sequence trimming in acc.ver update of AC139149 removes alignment with adjacent clone on TPF
issue.description: Trimming of AC139149.6 in acc.ver update since Build 36 eliminates overlap with AC139530.3
issue.resolution_text: AC137896.5 has been added to the TPF and spans this gap, overlapping flanking clones AC139149.5 and AC139530.3

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113931 may be redundant to reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113931 may be redundant to reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC037482.14 (RP11-619M15) represents an alternate sequence compared to GRCh37 NC_000017.10 that provides the best representation for the following two RefSeqs: NM_033059.2 (Homo sapiens keratin associated protein 4-11 (KRTAP4-11)) and NM_033061.2 (Homo sapiens keratin associated protein 4-7 (KRTAP4-7)).

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113943 may represent sequence from an alternate haplotype
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113943 may represent sequence from an alternate haplotype
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced contig NT_113943, consisting of component AC145205.2, has been made redundant with the addition of AC233701.6.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113941 may extend into a gap on reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113941 may extend into a gap on reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: Previously unlocalized contig NT_113941.1, which consists of component AC145166.2, localizes to this gap, but is redundant and deleted compared to current extensions of AC233273/ABBA01006765. It has been removed from the reference.

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC134407.6 and AC145343.3
issue.resolution_text: The gap between AC134407.6 and AC145343.3 will be filled with AC174157 once it is complete, the unique of which agrees approximately with the Optical map gap size.

issue.summary: Should unplaced contig NT_113945 be retained in the assembly?
issue.description: Define evidence for retaining NT_113945 in the assembly as an unplaced contig
issue.resolution_text: AC145209.2, the sole, finished component of NT_113945, has been marked as redundant with reference clone AC139099.2.

issue.summary: Missing alignment for AC144838.3 and AC231660.2
issue.description: Missing alignment for AC144838.3 and AC231660.2
issue.resolution_text: AC231660 has been found to be chimeric and will be removed in the updated TPF.

issue.summary: possible deletion in AC087749.12 affecting MYO15B gene.
issue.description: Deletion ( single base T) in AC087749.12 affecting translation of the MYO15B gene.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF511237.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for Gene ID: 80022 (MYO15B) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC141424.4 and AC015853.8
issue.resolution_text: AC233274.2 extends into this gap for GRCh38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-2285.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC144838.3 and AC138761.4
issue.resolution_text: AC233273.2 was sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1319.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC027821.15 and AC021317.19
issue.resolution_text: The old gap flanking accessions have been replaced with two RP11 clones, AC183087.2 and AC183084.2, which close the gap and represent a single haplotype.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC060780.18 and AC109326.11
issue.resolution_text: AC160862 WI2-3095P13 confirms the short overlap of AC060780.18 and AC109326.11

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC134407.6 and AC145343.4
issue.resolution_text: AC245753.1 has been sequenced and submitted and spans the AC134407.6 - AC145343.4 gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC142247.2 and AC027824.17
issue.resolution_text: AC233701.6 has been sequenced and submitted and closes this gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145208.2 and AC137723.5.
issue.resolution_text: Several clones have been placed extending into this gap for GRCh37. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in HG-1320.

issue.summary: Chr17 gap and current mosaic representation of region
issue.description: Copy number variation gap in the CCL3L1/CCL4L1 region of Chromosome 17
issue.resolution_text: We have closed this gap by re-tiling through this region with clones from a single haplotype library.

issue.description: Build 36 unplaced contig NT_113933.1 may be redundant to sequence on reference chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: This contig, NT_113933.1, component AC129894.9, was dropped from the Build 37 unlocalized TPF because it is phase 1 draft sequence. This clone's re-sequencing and placement will be tracked in linked ticket HG-417.

issue.summary: 17q21.31 mosaic tilepath and disease implicated inversion
issue.description: 17q21.31 is a mosaic of two inverted haplotypes described by Stefansson et al Nature Genetics 2005
issue.resolution_text: The assembly has been updated so that a single haplotype through this region is now represented in GRCh37 on NC_000017.10. The inversion haplotype is included in GRCh37 as an alternate locus, NT_167251.1.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible gap extending clone
issue.description: Clone RP11-437N10 has possible extending sequence into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: Attempts to sequence RP11-437N10 failed, because the digests of the new growths did not match the existing digests. Further efforts to close this gap will be tracked in HG-744.

issue.description: Possible sequence loss in tandem cluster of 10-20 nearly identical ~6.1 kb repeat units
issue.resolution_text: AC024051.5 contains 13 copies of GeneID:6066 RNU2-1 (NR_002716.2), which was missing from GRCh37. This clone has been sequenced and submitted, and it replaces most of the sequence of NC_000017.10 component AC109326.11 for GRCh38.

issue.description: The haplotype provided for this region in GRCh37 removes 2 TBC1D genes that were represented in Build 36. This is a candidate region for representation by an alternate loci.
issue.resolution_text: A single haplotype pathway composed of CHORI-17 clones, spanning two TBC1D3 gene clusters, has replaced the reference in this region. Two ALT_LOCI have been created to provide additional representation for this hypervariable region.

issue.description: There are discrepancies in the alignment of RefSeq NM_015584.3 (POLDIP2) to reference component AC002094.1.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF573649.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update these bases to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID:26073 (POLDIP2) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a discrepancy in the alignment of RefSeq NM_080669.3 (SLC46A1) to reference component AC002094.1
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoints have been curated to use the sequence of AC015917.30, which agrees with NM_080669.3 (SLC46A1), through this region of overlap.

issue.summary: GeneID: 83882 (TSPAN10) has discrepant alignment to reference genome
issue.description: GRCh37 has a 4 bp "TAAC"insertion in NC_000017.10 (nt 79614937) within the coding sequence of NM_031945.3 (TSPAN10), which creates in an early stop codon. This corresponds to SNP rs202122134.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459694.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this 4nt indel to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 83882 (TSPAN10) in GRCh38.

issue.description: Alignment of MYO19 (GeneID: 80179) detects a possible repeat expansion/CNV in the reference genome.
issue.resolution_text: We've replaced GRCh37 reference component AC126327.6 with AC233700.3 for GRCh37-Patch Release 2, accession GL383560.1. GL383560.1 does not contain the extra repeat, and MYO19 (GeneID: 80179) aligns to it as a single exon with no indels.

issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000017.10 nt 68,096,908 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NM_018658.1 (GeneID: 3773 (KCNJ16)).
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459700.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to update this base to the more common allele and improve representation for GeneID: 3773 (KCNJ16) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_015670.4 (SENP3) and the genomic region to which it aligns (AC016876.10).
issue.resolution_text: Mincontig KF495719.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to correct this base and improve representation for GeneID: 26168 (SENP3) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a 14nt indel between RefSeq NM_014001.2 (GGA3) and the genomic region to which it aligns (AC022211.5).
issue.resolution_text: AEKP01093165.1 has been added to the Chr. 17 Reference to patch component AC022211.5, updating this 14nt indel to the more common allele and improving representation for GeneID: 23163 (GGA3) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: 3-base deletion in CDRT4 gene at splice donor junction of exon 1
issue.description: Unvalidates SNP rs66754946 indicates missing AAG in CDRT4 gene. Deletion not supported by any transcript that matches here.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket refers to the same issue reported in linked ticket HG-1132, describing an additional RefSeq in disagreement with the Reference. Further investigation of this discrepancy will be tracked in HG-1132

issue.summary: splice site polymorphism for an MPP2 gene variant
issue.description: A splice site polymorphism, SNP rs231518, affects an MPP2 gene splice variant, abolishing the splice donor of a cassette exon. The reference genome represents the minor allele.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontigs KF495763.1 and KF459696.1 have been generated and added to the Chr. 17 Reference to correct a 2nt error and update one base to the more common allele, respectively, and to improve representation for GeneID: 4355 (MPP2) in GRCh38.

issue.summary: AC025682.6 has possible 5bp deletion in intron/alternative exon of NPEPPS
issue.status_text: Alignments of this gene to the reference are being reviewed.
issue.description: AC025682.6 has a possible 5bp deletion in an intron or alternative exon of gene NPEPPS. No transcripts out of approximately 30 support the genome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: An acc.ver update to reference component AC137723.5 has removed several genes, which can still be found on an unplaced contig (NT_113944, component AC145207.2)
issue.resolution_text: AC145207 RP11-498C9 has been place in the TPF and updated in Build37. AC145207 should replace sequences that had been in AC137723.5 but are not in AC137723.6

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between AC144838.3 and AC138761.4.
issue.resolution_text: A 92.68kb extension into this gap since GRCh37 was released as a FIX patch for GRCh37: GL383561.1.

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between AC141424.4 and AC015853.8
issue.resolution_text: A 1.35kb extension into this gap since GRCh37 was released as a FIX patch for GRCh37: GL383562.1.
